scripts.watch: npm run css-watch && npm run js-compile-bundle-watch
scripts.compile: npm run css-compile && npm run js-compile-bundle
scripts.js-compile-bundle: babel src/js/common.js src/js/array.js src/js/jquery.easing.js src/js/dateDriver.js src/js/bsBreakPointDriver.js src/js/dayList.js src/js/selection.js src/js/dayList.js src/js/calendar.js src/js/rooms.js src/js/bsDropdownExtension.js -o dist/js/bundle.js --minified
scripts.js-compile-bundle-watch: babel src/js/common.js src/js/array.js src/js/jquery.easing.js src/js/dateDriver.js src/js/bsBreakPointDriver.js src/js/dayList.js src/js/selection.js src/js/dayList.js src/js/calendar.js src/js/rooms.js src/js/bsDropdownExtension.js -o dist/js/bundle.js --watch
